sourcesContent:
import {
  Button,
  Image,
  Modal,
  ModalBody,
  ModalCloseButton,
  ModalContent,
  ModalFooter,
  ModalHeader,
  ModalOverlay,
  Text,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";

export const CharModal = ({ onClose, isOpen, character }) => {
  return (
    <>
      <Modal isOpen={isOpen} onClose={onClose}>
        <ModalOverlay />
        <ModalContent>
          <ModalHeader>{character.name}</ModalHeader>
          <ModalCloseButton />
          <ModalBody>
            <Image src={character.image} alt={character.name} />
            <Text>Status: {character.status}</Text>
            <Text w="100%">Gênero: {character.gender}</Text>
            <Text w="100%">Espécie: {character.species}</Text>
            <Text>Tipo: {character.type}</Text>
            <Text>Planeta de origem: {character.origin.name}</Text>
            <Text>Localizaçao{character.location.name}</Text>
          </ModalBody>

          <ModalFooter>
            <Button colorScheme="blue" mr={3} onClick={onClose}>
              Close
            </Button>
          </ModalFooter>
        </ModalContent>
      </Modal>
    </>
  );
};
